nodes.text: Gatalenta was a planet located in the galaxy. By the third Galactic War, Gatalentans were known for their tea and their long tradition of supporting the Jedi. Gatalenta was considered a beautiful planet by Ardinondu Dipolus Daeruun, a general in the Galactic Republic.

Gatalenta was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in BioWare's 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, specifically the 2018 Jedi Under Siege update for the 2016 Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion. The planet is only mentioned if the player's character, known in-universe as the Alliance Commander, is among the character classes originally aligned with the Republic. Gatalenta was originally introduced in the 2016 canon novel Bloodline, written by Claudia Gray.
